columns.name: resource_type
columns.description: The type of resource the SKU applies to

columns.name: tier
columns.description: Specifies the tier of virtual machines in a scale set

columns.name: family
columns.description: The Family of this particular SKU

columns.name: kind
columns.description: The Kind of resources that are supported in this SKU

columns.name: maximum_capacity
columns.description: The maximum capacity that can be set

columns.name: minimum_capacity
columns.description: The minimum capacity that can be set

columns.name: scale_type
columns.description: The scale type applicable to the sku

columns.name: api_versions
columns.description: The api versions that support this SKU

columns.name: capabilities
columns.description: A name value pair to describe the capability

columns.name: costs
columns.description: A list of metadata for retrieving price info

columns.name: location_info
columns.description: A list of locations and availability zones in those locations where the SKU is available

columns.name: locations
columns.description: The set of locations that the SKU is available

columns.name: restrictions
columns.description: The restrictions because of which SKU cannot be used
